attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I read with distain again this government destroying this countries Britishness.  Britannia epitamises the British way of life and encompasses all people who are British in this country.  We, the British people,  didn't ask for it so please reconsider....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
